description:
Takeshi Hokuto, the son of a powerful man, has brought eighteen other high schools under his control, and now it`s Cromartie`s time to feel the power of the Hokuto. There`s just one problem: they`re all idiots.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Comment Hokuto fit main basse sur Cromartie
Empire of Ambition / The Strike Back Empire / Let`s Strum on a Guitar in the Mountains
Yabou no Teikoku / Gyakushuu Teikoku / Yama de Guitar o Kakinarasou
野望の帝国 / 逆襲帝国 / 山でギターをかきならそう
